notification: You must open your Notification Settings of your device to change preferences
location: We use your location to notify you of nearby events. Open your device settings to change location sharing preferences.
sharing: These global sharing options will enable or disable the ability of your friends to see your academic or social activities in your feed.
chat: This option will enable or disable the ability to chat with others.
covid_daily_health_checks: Share COVID symptom related health records
covid_test_records: Share COVID test related health records
